message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,300,000.  I know it's worth that much to you, and I'm confident you'll see the value in this deal.  Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your perspective on the market value, I'm still confident in the value of my product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,250,000. This reflects a fair compromise and allows for a mutually beneficial transaction.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,225,000. This is the highest I can go, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
